description: This file declares utility functions and includes relevant headers for DHCP message handling, socket communication, and network data dumping, relevant to a DHCP implementation or network utility module.

methods.name: dhcp_send
methods.description: Sends a DHCP message over a socket.

methods.name: insert_arp_record
methods.description: Inserts an ARP record for a given device and IP address.

methods.name: dhcp_create_socket
methods.description: Creates a DHCP socket on a specified port and device.

methods.name: dhcp_recvfrom_to
methods.description: Receives data from a socket with specified destination address.

methods.name: dump_data
methods.description: Dumps raw data in a human-readable format.

methods.name: dump_data_short
methods.description: Dumps data in a short format for quick inspection.

methods.name: dump_mac_addr
methods.description: Prints a MAC address in a readable format.

methods.name: dump_ip_addr
methods.description: Prints an IP address in a readable format.

methods.name: dump_ip_list
methods.description: Dumps a list of IP addresses.

methods.name: dump_dhcp_option
methods.description: Prints details of a DHCP option.

methods.name: dump_dhcp_option_list
methods.description: Prints a list of DHCP options.

methods.name: dump_dhcp_msg
methods.description: Prints a DHCP message and its options.
